name: RoadRun 2
description:
The 2nd Edition of the game "RoadRun" It was originally made for a game-jam and we really enjoyed it.
It was full of bugs, but this time we have some bug-spray so it's not an issue anymore! It will be fully released at around the 16th of March over here and on Google Play as well, but until then, you can check out the progress over here!
